name: Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A hearty stir fry packed with beef and colorful vegetables for a nutritious meal.
steps: 1. Wash the carrot and potato thoroughly under running water.
2. Peel the potato and carrot, then cut them into thin strips.
3. Dice the tomato.
4. Slice the beef into thin strips.
5. In a pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat.
6. Add the beef strips to the pan and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
7. Add the carrot and potato strips, stirring frequently, and cook for another 5 minutes.
8. Add the diced tomato and stir well, cooking for an additional 3 minutes.
9. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and pour them into the pan, mixing them with the beef and vegetables.
10. Cook until the eggs are fully set, about 2-3 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Tuna Pasta Salad
description: A refreshing salad combining tuna and pasta with fresh vegetables.
steps: 1. Boil a pot of salted water, then add 150g of pasta and cook according to package instructions (about 8-10 minutes) until al dente.
2. While the pasta cooks, dice the tomato and peel, cube the sweetpotato.
3. In a separate pot, steam the sweetpotato cubes for about 10 minutes until tender.
4. Drain the pasta and rinse under cold water to cool it down.
5. In a large bowl, combine the drained tuna, diced tomato, steamed sweetpotato, and the cooled pasta.
6. Mix well, adding salt and pepper to taste. Serve chilled.

name: Egg and Vegetable Breakfast Sandwich
description: A nutritious sandwich loaded with eggs and fresh vegetables.
steps: 1. Crack 2 eggs into a bowl and whisk them until well combined.
2. Heat a pan over medium heat with a little oil or butter.
3. Pour the eggs into the hot pan and let them sit for about 1-2 minutes until starting to set.
4. Grate the carrot and dice the tomato.
5. Add the grated carrot and diced tomato to the eggs, allow to cook for another 2-3 minutes until the eggs are fully cooked.
6. Toast the slices of bread.
7. Once cooked, place the egg mixture on a slice of toasted bread, then top with the other slice. Serve warm.

name: Fish and Sweetpotato Cakes
description: Crunchy cakes made from fish and sweetpotato, perfect as a snack or meal.
steps: 1. Peel and cube the sweetpotato, then steam for about 15 minutes until soft.
2. In a bowl, mash the steamed sweetpotatoes.
3. Add in the fish (cooked if needed), 1 beaten egg, and breadcrumbs made from the bread.
4. Mix thoroughly until well combined.
5. Shape the mixture into small cakes.
6. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat, then fry the cakes for about 4-5 minutes on each side until golden brown.
7. Serve hot with a side of salad or dipping sauce.

name: Pineapple Beef Stir Fry
description: A tropical variation of a classic beef stir-fry with sweet pineapple.
steps: 1. Wash and peel the carrot, then cut it into thin strips.
2. Cut the pineapple into small chunks.
3. Slice the beef into strips, season lightly with salt.
4. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a stir-fry pan over medium-high heat.
5. Add the beef stripes and cook for about 4-5 minutes until browned.
6. Add the carrot strips and pineapple chunks; cook for another 4 minutes, stirring frequently.
7. Add diced tomato, cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, mixing well to combine flavors.
8. Serve hot over a bed of rice or on its own.

name: Tuna and Potato Cakes
description: Delicious and filling tuna cakes, blending potatoes and tuna for a unique dish.
steps: 1. Peel and dice the potato, then boil in salted water for about 15 minutes until tender.
2. Drain and mash the boiled potato in a bowl.
3. In the bowl with mashed potato, add the drained tuna and 1 beaten egg.
4. Mix until well combined and form into small patties.
5. Heat oil in a pan and fry the patties over medium heat for about 4-5 minutes on each side until golden brown.
6. Serve warm with a salad or your favorite sauce.
